alert.note: Alert for Kimble; Mason; Menard; San Saba; Schleicher; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 10:39PM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Light freezing rain, sleet, and some light snow expected. Total ice accumulations of a few hundredths of an inch, with locally higher amounts near one tenth of an inch possible. Little to no snow accumulations expected. * WHERE...Runnels, Tom Green, Schleicher, Sutton, Coleman, Brown, Concho, McCulloch, San Saba, Menard, Mason, and Kimble counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads, and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Kimble; Mason; Menard; San Saba; Schleicher; Sutton
